name: Send a PDF document from SharePoint (using OneDrive Site's Drive) for signing via PandaDoc
description:
Every time a pdf document is uploaded to SharePoint, Make will automatically upload it to PandaDoc and send it for signing.

The SharePoint site has to be followed by the signed-in user who creates a scenario from this template.

The template works for pdf documents that have either 1 signature form field named "signature" or 2 signature form fields named "signature1" and "signature2" for 1 and 2 signers respectively. The name of the document has to be in the following [format](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1et-VVbGkM_dfMfcow7HZq3IkYoIQ7ZlfNxIoq51Phfw/edit?usp=sharing).
